<small>Aramaic form: **<big>[[H5368|נְקַשׁ]]</big>**</small>
 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נָקַשׁ‎</span>] **verb** ==knock, strike== only in specific sense of hit, strike or bring down (a bird), and only figurative (Ecclus <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ינקש‎</span> [[Eccl.41.2|Eccl 41:2]] c ***striketh*** against (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ב‎</span>; margin <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ונוקש‎</span>), so <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נוקש ב‎</span> 13:2c; Late Hebrew ***knock, strike*** e.g. the knees, or a door (so Hiph\`il); Aramaic (including Biblical Aramaic) <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נְקַשׁ‎</span> ***id.***, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***fixit, impegit, percussit***, etc. (Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***strike in, carve***, etc., is loan-word [[BDB#Frä|Frä]]<sup>194</sup>); — the Hebrew verb apparently means ***bring down with a*** [certain kind of] ***stick***, perhaps like a boomerang, see description and illustration in [[BDB#Wilkinson|Wilkinson]]<sup>gypten 323</sup> [[BDB#WMM|WMM]]<sup>Asien u. Europa.123f.</sup>); — 

**Qal** ***Participle*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נוֺקֵשׁ‎</span> [[Ps.9.17|Ps 9:17]] he (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span>) ***striketh down*** the wicked (so [[BDB#Hup|Hup-Now]] [[BDB#De|De]] [[BDB#Che|Che]]); [[BDB#Vrss|Vrss]] [[BDB#Ol|Ol]] [[BDB#Ew|Ew]] [[BDB#Bae|Bae]] [[BDB#Kau|Kau]] [[BDB#We|We]] [[BDB#Buhl|Buhl]]<sup>Lex</sup> read <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נוֺקַשׁ‎</span>, **Niph\`al** from <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יקשׁ‎</span>. **Niph\`al** ***Imperfect*** 2 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תִּנָּקֵשׁ אַחֲרֵיהֶם‎</span> [[Deut.12.30|Deut 12:30]] lest ***thou be thrust*** (impelled) ***after them***. **Pi\`el** ***Imperfect*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יְנַקֵּשׁ‎</span> [[Ps.109.11|Ps 109:11]] let the creditor ***strike*** at, ***take aim*** at (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ל‎</span>); 3 masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיְנַקְּשׁוּ‎</span> [[Ps.38.13|Ps 38:13]] (absolute). **Hithpa\`el** ***Participle*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִתְנַקֵּשׁ בְּנַפְשִׁי‎</span> [[1Sam.28.9|1Sam 28:9]] why ***art*** thou ***striking at my life?*** 

I, II. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נֵר‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נִר‎</span>, (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נִיר‎</span>) see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נור‎</span> p. 632f
